name: Odd||Even
description: Odd||Even is a math and logic based, integer placement puzzle game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1GHz or Faster Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: IntelÂ® HD Graphics 3000/2000 (OpenGL 3.1 or above supported card) Storage: 50 MB available space

reviews.review_text: As Odd||Even stands right now, avoid it.  It is completely unresponsive and the only keys that work as of this writing (7 May 2016) are the Alt+F4 to close it. That's a pity because I was really wanting to play this game - it looks fun.  Save yourself $5 and wait for a fix before you buy the game.  To the devs: once a fix is rolled out, I'll take this down and give you a proper review, okay?
I bought it at 1 buck. Can't be mad at it.
The UI needs a lot of work. The game feels incomplete. But it's true that the game essence it all there, it's just not optimized.
